folio.description: Unique identifier for each participant or record

P20.description: Variable related to the project, specific description not provided

AC_sexH.description: Sex of the child (H for male in Spanish)

AC_fechanac.description: Date of birth of the child

fechanac_M.description: Date of birth of the mother

etapa.description: Stage or phase of the project or study

fecha_eta.description: Date related to the stage or phase of the project

entrevis_cues.description: Identifier for the interview or questionnaire

fecha_cuest.description: Date of the interview or questionnaire

edad1.description: Age of the individual (likely the mother or child)

c9.description: Variable related to living in Mexico City

c10.description: Variable related to the time living in Mexico City

c111.description: Variable related to literacy (ability to read and write)

c112.description: Variable related to the total years of education approved

c13.description: Variable related to marital status with specific options like married, single, etc.

c141.description: Variable related to the partner's education level

c142.description: Variable related to the partner's years of education approved

c15.description: Variable related to the partner's total years of education approved

c161.description: Variable related to the partner's workplace exposure to prints

c162.description: Variable related to the partner's workplace exposure to lead foundry

c163.description: Variable related to the partner's workplace exposure to plumbing workshop

c164.description: Variable related to the partner's workplace exposure to battery workshop

c165.description: Variable related to the partner's workplace exposure to paint or varnish factory

c166.description: Variable related to the partner's workplace exposure to ceramic factory

c167.description: Variable related to the partner's workplace exposure to gasoline refinery

c168.description: Variable related to the partner's workplace exposure to gas station

c17.description: Variable related to the type of street the individual lives on (traffic volume)

c18.description: Variable related to the use of glazed clay pots in childhood

c19.description: Variable related to the current use of glazed clay pots

c20.description: Variable related to the frequency of using glazed clay pots

c21.description: Variable related to the number of days storing food in glazed clay pots

c22.description: Variable related to the number of years storing food in glazed clay pots

c23.description: Variable related to the number of days preparing food in glazed clay pots

c24.description: Variable related to the number of years preparing food in glazed clay pots

c25.description: Variable related to the consumption of food prepared in glazed clay pots the previous day

c26.description: Variable related to the source of drinking water

c27.description: Variable related to boiling drinking water before consumption
